LECTURE_AUTO_STATUS.description: The bot will automatically read all statuses (yes to activate and no to deactivate)

TELECHARGER_AUTO_STATUS.description: The bot will automatically download all statuses (yes to activate and no to deactivate)

LIENS_MENU.description: Add one or more image or video links for your bot; example: link1,link2,link3......

PM_PERMIT.description: Commands will not work in private for other users (yes to activate and no to deactivate)

MODE_PUBLIC.description: Yes for public mode or no for private mode (where only you will use the bot)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Insert your Heroku account API key

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Insert the name you provided (APP NAME) at the beginning of the page

ETAT.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate you are online even if you are not. 2 to say you are typing a message. 3 to indicate you are recording an audio. Or leave the field empty to show your real status.

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your phone number; it should be in the format ID+number

WARN_COUNT.description: This is the limit for warning count

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Set to yes if you want to receive the bot's starting message privately, or no if you don't

ANTI_VUE_UNIQUE.description: Set to yes if you want the content of messages in single view to be sent to you privately

PM_CHATBOT.description: Set to yes if you want the bot to automatically respond to private messages and even chat with your contacts without your consent

ANTI_COMMAND_SPAM.description: Add a cooldown time of one minute after each command for other users, meaning delete group messages (to activate choose *yes* or leave simply)
